# Terraform Armis Centrix Provider

> Terraform/OpenTofu provider for managing Armis Centrix security platform resources. Enables Infrastructure as Code (IaC) management of users, roles, policies, and collectors in Armis Centrix environments. Built with Terraform Plugin SDK v2 and the external armis-sdk-go SDK. Requires Terraform >= 0.12 or OpenTofu >= 1.5, and Go >= 1.25 for development.

The provider authenticates via API key and URL, supporting both environment variables (ARMIS_API_KEY, ARMIS_API_URL) and provider configuration. The API key is obtained from the Armis console under Settings > API Management.

## Resources

Resources support full CRUD operations for managing Armis Centrix entities:

- [armis_user](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/resources/user.md): Manage Armis users with roles, sites, and role assignments
- [armis_role](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/resources/role.md): Create and manage custom Armis roles with permissions
- [armis_policy](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/resources/policy.md): Configure security policies with rules and actions
- [armis_collector](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/resources/collector.md): Manage Armis collector virtual appliances

## Data Sources

Data sources provide read-only access to Armis Centrix information:

- [armis_user](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/data-sources/user.md): Look up user details by ID
- [armis_roles](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/data-sources/roles.md): Query available roles
- [armis_policies](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/data-sources/policies.md): List security policies
- [armis_collectors](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/data-sources/collectors.md): Retrieve collector information
- [armis_sites](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/data-sources/sites.md): List Armis sites
- [armis_boundary](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/data-sources/boundary.md): Query boundary configurations
- [armis_lists](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/data-sources/lists.md): Access Armis lists
- [armis_reports](https://github.com/1898andCo/terraform-provider-armis-centrix/blob/main/docs/data-sources/reports.md): Retrieve report configurations
